item.description:
This opera has shown up for half price on BosTix.  I am definitely going and anyone can join me.

The cost is $25.50 per person, which includes all fees.  If you want to join me, go here to order your ticket:
http://www.bostix.org/tickets/show.asp

The date is WEDNESDAY, MARCH 16.  Don't wait - BosTix offers usually sell out quickly.


Hope some of you can join me for an evening at the opera!

 

Conspiracy, incest and murder!!! Come see a fantastic opera by the master composer, George Frederick Handel! (Yes, he wrote more than just "The Hallelujah Chorus!")

Agrippina wants her rotten son to be the Emperor of Rome. What’s a mother to do? She promises anything to everyone standing in her way: Nero himself, an ambitious courtesan, a general, a couple of fawning sycophants, and half the Roman Senate. Also her husband, current Emperor Claudius. The numbers are staggering. No, really. Handel’s music soars. Come delight in his fresh musical invention and some crazy, hothouse humanity.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email with a meeting point
item.name: Handel's "Agrippina" by Boston Lyric Opera - it's ON!
